title: Ranked LP WTF
body:
I'm currently in Silver 3 but I play against low gold and high silver players usually. I always thought I was getting 25 - 30 LP gains because I was playing these higher ranked players.

But then I played some duo queue with a friend and everyone on the enemy team was Silver 5 -  4. I earned **37 LP** for that game.

WTF happened? I should have earned like 15 LP since everyone was lower elo than me. Is ranked changed now?
